item.title: Comment on by Chise
item.dc:creator: Chise
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2018/11/21/150/#comment-86">how to get help in windows 10</a>.
One of the ideas of this blog is not to have any pictures on it. All pictures were removed at the very beginning, and there are no plans to add any. Thank you for your understanding.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to how to get help in windows 10.

One of the ideas of this blog is not to have any pictures on it. All pictures were removed at the very beginning, and there are no plans to add any. Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: Comment on by Chise
item.dc:creator: Chise
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2018/11/21/150/#comment-77">Jack</a>.
Thank you for your sincere appreciation.
Sorry for the long delay before approval and reply since I simply write this bolg from time to time.
If you're going to create a new bolg, try starting form customizing an existing theme which could be found at the admin panel of WordPress. This site is based upon Twenty-seventeen, a theme come along with regular WordPress installation, and removed all the elements unnecessary.
If you have any further questions I am very willing to stay in touch, just send me an email to kasper@chise.us at your convenience.
Thanks again for your appreciation, and sorry for the delay.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jack.

Thank you for your sincere appreciation.

Sorry for the long delay before approval and reply since I simply write this bolg from time to time.

If you’re going to create a new bolg, try starting form customizing an existing theme which could be found at the admin panel of WordPress. This site is based upon Twenty-seventeen, a theme come along with regular WordPress installation, and removed all the elements unnecessary.

If you have any further questions I am very willing to stay in touch, just send me an email to kasper@chise.us at your convenience.

Thanks again for your appreciation, and sorry for the delay.
